Name: Landmarks, Constellation CB5, Brooklyn (C 250312 HAK).
Title: Application number C 250312 HAK (Constellation CB5) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project, and pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located at 881-885 New Jersey Avenue (Block 4348, Lots 48 and 50) and 650 Glenmore Avenue (Block 3998, Lot 17), Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 5, Council District 42.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
